experience.title: Software Developer
responsibilities: Developed dynamic web applications using ReactJS, enhancing user engagement by 30% for 2,000+ users.
Improved system performance by reducing data retrieval time by 40% through effective RESTful API integration.
Led agile sessions, translating user stories into actionable tasks, resulting in the timely delivery of 4+ high-impact projects.
Boosted code reliability by 30% through comprehensive unit testing and reduced version control conflicts by 40% using Git.
Skilled in React, Redux, React Router, advanced JavaScript (ES6+), TypeScript, and modern front-end build tools.
Optimized performance using Webpack, Babel, and code-splitting techniques.

experience.title: Web Development
responsibilities: Built responsive web applications with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React, enhancing user interaction.
Integrated RESTful APIs to improve web application functionality and user experience.
Collaborated using Git for version control, ensuring efficient codebase management and team coordination.
Applied best practices for coding to optimize web applications for speed and scalability.
